nodes.text: The Kril'Dor system was a star system located in the Outer Jalor sector of the galaxy's Mid Rim that contained the planet Kril'Dor.

The Kril'Dor system was originally created for Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy, a Star Wars Legends first- and third-person shooter developed by Raven Software and released on September 16, 2003. It was first identified in The Essential Atlas, a reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and released on August 18, 2009, which placed the system in grid square I-7.
